title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Archives
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Paleontology     Archives                Archives       The monument's archive collection includes thousands of paleontology documents including manuscripts, photographs, and historical brochures. You can take a peak at a few of these historical documents below.       Plates from Tertiary Insects of North America (Scudder, 1890)         Historical brochures from Pike Petrified Forest and Colorado Petrified Forest         Historical excavation sites for MacGinitie (left) and Scudder (right)         Map of sedimentary lacustrine basin at Florissant near South ParkDrawn by A. Lakes Feb 20, 1878
